Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society.
Can I speak to the person in your household, 15 years or older, whose birthday it was most recently? INTERVIEWER ADD IF NECESSARY: this is necessary to ensure everyone has an equal chance to participate, for the survey to be representative of this country’s population.
How old is he or she? Can you pass the phone to this household member?
{#Birthday_ins} Household member with the most recent birthday is:

Heileo, is mise ..., as (AINM NA HINSTITIÚIDE NÁISIÚNTA), agus táim ag déanamh agallaimh do Ghnóthaí Poiblí Ipsos, ar son cliant dá chuid. Táimid ag lorg daoine in aois 15 bliana atá sásta a gcuid tuairimí a thabhairt ar shaincheisteanna i sochaí an lae inniu.
An féidir liom labhairt leis an duine sa teach, 15 bliana nó níos sine, a raibh breithlá is déanaí ann? EOLAS BREISE DON AGALLÓIR MÁS GÁ: tá sé sin riachtanach lena chinntiú go bhfuil comhdheis ag gach duine páirt a ghlacadh ann, ionas go dtugann an suirbhé léargas ar dhaonra na tíre seo.
Cén aois é nó í? An féidir leat an fón seo a thabhairt don duine sin sa teaghlach?
{#Birthday_ins} Tá an duine sa teaghlach a raibh breithlá is déanaí ann:

Those are all the questions we have for you today. Thank you for your time.

All information you provide is kept strictly confidential and is used for research purposes only.

Ba iad sin na ceisteanna uile a bhí againn ort inniu. Go raibh maith agat as do chuid ama.

Coinnítear gach faisnéis a thugann tú faoi rún docht agus úsáidtear chun críocha taighde amháin í.
I’m rather in favour of the European Union, but not the way it has been realised until now
Táim sách fabhrach don Aontas Eorpach ach ní sa mhéid is a baineadh amach é go dtí seo

The survey includes some questions that could be considered sensitive as they relate to political opinions. Your child may refuse to answer these questions at any time, and you can withdraw your consent for your child’s participation at any time.

Áirítear sa suirbhé seo roinnt ceisteanna a d'fhéadfaí a mheas mar íogair mar go mbaineann siad le tuairimí polaitíochta. Is féidir le do leanbh diúltú na ceisteanna sin a fhreagairt am ar bith, agus tig leat do thoiliú ar rannpháirtíocht do linbh a tharraing siar am ar bith.

Approximately, what percentage of the value of your company's products and or services were sold to other EU Member States in {#CurrentYear_insert_1}? ADD, IF NEEDED: If you are not sure, please provide your best estimate. (READ OUT IF NECESSARY, ONE ANSWER ONLY)

Go neasach, cén céatadán den luach de tháirgí nó seirbhísí do chuideachta a díoladh le Ballstáit eile an AE in {#CurrentYear_insert_1}? BREIS, MÁS GÁ: Mura bhfuil tú cinnte, tabhair do mheastachán is fearr. (LÉIGH AMACH MÁS GÁ, FREAGRA AMHÁIN DE DHÍTH)

(WHEN SPEAKING TO THE TARGETED RESPONDENT) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting decision makers in companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means that neither you, nor your business, will be identifiable in any of the published results. For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public and business opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues. WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: No personal data will be collected during this interview. Your participation, together with your individual responses to the questions, will be kept strictly confidential. If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com Are you happy to proceed with the interview? (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

(AG LABHAIRT LEIS AN SPRIOC-FHREAGRÓIR) Heileo, is mise ..., as (AINM NA HINSTITIÚIDE NÁISIÚNTA), agus táim ag déanamh agallamh thar cheann Ghnóthaí Poiblí Ipsos, ar son cliant dá chuid. Táimid ag dul i dteagmháil le lucht cinnteoireachta i gcuideachtaí fud fad na hEorpa maidir lena dtuairimí ar ábhair ghnó faoi láthair. Úsáidfear an t-aiseolas le tacú le ceapadh beartais san Eoraip. Ba mhór agam dá dtabharfá {#minutes_ins} nóiméad dom chun páirt a ghlacadh sa suirbhé seo. Is de do dheoin féin rannpháirtíocht sa suirbhé agus tig leat d'intinn a athrú am ar bith. Beidh gach freagra faoi rún agus cuirfear isteach le freagraí na rannpháirtithe uile eile iad. Ciallaíonn sé sin nach mbeidh tusa, ná do ghnó, inaitheanta in aon torthaí a fhoilseofar. Le haghaidh dearbhú cáilíochta, d'fhéadfaí an glao seo a mhonatóiriú agus a thaifeadadh. BREIS EOLAIS MÁ IARRTAR AR AN AGALLÓIR: CLIANT? Tá Ipsos ag déanamh an tsuirbhé seo ar son {#Client}. Is é cuspóir Suirbhéanna Splancacha Eorabharaiméadair monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar thuairimí an phobail agus lucht gnó san Aontas Eorpach maidir le réimse leathan saincheisteanna téamacha. CÉ NA SONRAÍ PEARSANTA A BHAILEOFAR: Ní bhaileofar aon sonraí pearsanta le linn an agallaimh seo. Fanfaidh do rannpháirtíocht, in éineacht le do fhreagraí aonair ar na ceisteanna, faoi rún docht. Má tá tráchtanna nó ceisteanna agat, nó aon chúis imní ort, seol ríomhphost chuig: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com An bhfuil tú sásta leanúint leis an agallamh? (FREAGRA SINGIL, NÁ LÉIGH AMACH)
16 years or older (will pass phone to start the interview)
16 bliana d'aois nó níos sine (tabharfaidh an fón ar aghaidh chun tús a chur leis an agallamh)

(READ IF TARGET RESPONDENT IS NOT THE PERSON WHO FIRST ANSWERED THE PHONE) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. The survey is not part of any market research, we are interested in measuring public opinion.
(READ FOR ALL RESPONDENTS) I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means you will not be identifiable in any of the published results. {#CONSENT_ins}
If you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purpose for processing your personal data as well as your data protection rights.
For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded.
INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: HOW DID YOU GET MY NUMBER: Your telephone number has been randomly generated by a computer, like all numbers we dial for this research. Our aim is to interview a representative sample of this country’s population.
CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues.
WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: We use your phone number to invite you to take part in this interview and for quality control purposes only. Gender and age information will be collected, as well as personal data from the replies to the interview questions (such as marital status). All of the information you provide will remain confidential, your answers will be combined with all other participants’ answers, and no identifiable data will be shared with Ipsos’ client.
Are you happy to proceed with the interview? {#Birthday_ins}

(LÉIGH AMACH MURAB IONANN AN SPRIOC-FHREAGRÓIR AGUS AN DUINE A D'FHREAGAIR AN GLAO) Heileo, is mise ..., as (AINM NA HINSTITIÚIDE NÁISIÚNTA), agus táim ag déanamh agallaimh do Ghnóthaí Poiblí Ipsos, ar son cliant dá chuid. Táimid ag lorg daoine in aois 15 bliana atá sásta a gcuid tuairimí a thabhairt ar shaincheisteanna i sochaí an lae inniu. Táimid ag déanamh an tsuirbhé seo fud fad na hEorpa. Níl an suirbhé seo mar chuid d'aon taighde margaíochta, tá suim againn i dtuairimí an phobail a thomhais.
(LÉIGH DO GACH FREAGRÓIR) Ba mhór agam dá dtabharfá {#minutes_ins} nóiméad dom chun páirt a ghlacadh sa suirbhé seo. Is de do dheoin féin rannpháirtíocht sa suirbhé agus tig leat d'intinn a athrú am ar bith. Beidh gach freagra faoi rún agus cuirfear isteach le freagraí na rannpháirtithe eile iad. Ciallaíonn sé sin nach mbeidh tú inaitheanta in aon torthaí a fhoilsítear. {#CONSENT_ins}
Más maith leat an Fógra maidir le Cosaint Sonraí a léamh, tá sé ar fáil ag {#intro_link}. Tugtar míniú ann ar an gcuspóir maidir le próiseáil do shonraí pearsanta chomh maith le do chearta um chosaint sonraí.
Le haghaidh dearbhú cáilíochta, d'fhéadfaí an glao seo a mhonatóiriú agus a thaifeadadh.
BREIS EOLAIS MÁ IARRTAR AR AN AGALLÓIR: CONAS A FUAIR TÚ M'UIMHIR: Ghin ríomhaire d'uimhir fóin go randamach, amhail gach uimhir a dhiailímid don taighde seo. Is é ár n-aidhm ná agallamh a chur ar shampla ionadaíoch na tíre seo.
CLIANT? Tá Ipsos ag déanamh an tsuirbhé seo ar son {#Client}. Is é cuspóir Suirbhéanna Splancacha Eorabharaiméadair monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar thuairimí an phobail san Aontas Eorpach maidir le réimse leathan saincheisteanna téamacha.
CÉ NA SONRAÍ PEARSANTA A BHAILEOFAR: Úsáidimid d'uimhir fóin le cuireadh a thabhairt duit páirt a ghlacadh san agallamh seo agus le haghaidh rialú cáilíochta amháin. Baileofar inscne agus aois, chomh maith le sonraí pearsanta ó na freagraí ar na ceisteanna san agallamh (amhail stádas pósta). Fanfaidh gach faisnéis a thabharfaidh tú faoi rún, cuirfear do chuid freagraí isteach le freagraí na rannpháirtithe uile eile agus ní chomhroinnfear aon sonraí inaitheanta le cliant Ipsos
An bhfuil tú sásta leanúint leis an agallamh? {#Birthday_ins}
Which of the following describes how you think of yourself? {#D2_ins}
Cé acu seo a leanas lena ndéanfá féin cur síos ort? {#D2_ins}
Qual é a entidade intermunicipal de sua residência?
Qual é a entidade intermunicipal de sua residência?
(DO NOT READ OUT; MULTIPLE ANSWERS POSSIBLE)
(NÁ LÉIGH AMACH; IS FÉIDIR GO DTABHARFAR GO LEOR FREAGRAÍ)

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE). May I speak with someone with decision making responsibilities (managing director, general manager, CEO, financial director) or someone leading the commercial activities (commercial manger, sales manager, marketing manager) or a legal officer in your company? (IF THE GATEKEEPER ASKS FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION) I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting (decision makers in) companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would greatly appreciate being able to speak with him or her to include his/her opinion in the study. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for a European public institution. I can only reveal the name of this institution during the interview. WHO TO CONTACT ABOUT THE SURVEY: If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

Heileo, Is mise …, as (AINM NA HINSTITIÚIDE NÁISIÚNTA). An féidir liom labhairt le duine a bhfuil cúram cinnteoireachta aige (stiúrthóir bainistíochta, bainisteoir ginearálta, POF, stiúrthóir airgeadais) nó duine a stiúrann na gníomhaíochtaí tráchtála (bainisteoir tráchtála, bainisteoir díolachán bainisteoir margaíochta) nó oifigeach dlí i do chuideachta? (MÁ IARRANN AN GEATÓIR TUILLEADH FAISNÉISE) Táim ag déanamh agallamh thar cheann Ghnóthaí Poiblí Ipsos, ar son cliant dá chuid. Táimid ag dul i dteagmháil le (lucht cinnteoireachta) i gcuideachtaí fud fad na hEorpa maidir lena dtuairimí ar ábhair ghnó faoi láthair. Úsáidfear an t-aiseolas le tacú le ceapadh beartais san Eoraip. Ba mhór agam labhairt leis an duine sin lena tuairim/lena thuairim a chur san áireamh sa staidéar. BREIS EOLAIS MÁ IARRTAR AR AN AGALLÓIR: CLIANT? Tá Ipsos ag déanamh an tsuirbhé seo ar son institiúid phoiblí Eorpach. Ní féidir liom ainm na hinstitiúide sin a thabhairt ach le linn an agallaimh. CÉ LEIS DUL I DTEAGMHÁIL FAOIN SUIRBHÉ: Má tá tráchtanna nó ceisteanna agat, nó aon chúis imní ort, seol ríomhphost chuig: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com (FREAGRA SINGIL, NÁ LÉIGH AMACH)

Over the last year, would you say that this image you have of the EU improved, got worse or stayed about the same? {#SD15_ins}
Le bliain anuas, an ndéarfá go bhfuil an dearcadh sin atá agat i dtaca leis an AE feabhsaithe, gur éirigh sé níos measa nó go bhfuil sé mar a bhí? {#SD15_ins}

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 16 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. The survey is not part of any market research, we are interested in measuring public opinion.
I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means you will not be identifiable in any of the published results. {#CONSENT_ins}
If you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purpose for processing your personal data as well as your data protection rights.
For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded.
INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: HOW DID YOU GET MY NUMBER: Your telephone number has been randomly generated by a computer, like all numbers we dial for this research. Our aim is to interview a representative sample of this country’s population.
CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues.
WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: We use your phone number to invite you to take part in this interview and for quality control purposes only. Gender and age information will be collected, as well as personal data from the replies to the interview questions (such as marital status). All of the information you provide will remain confidential, your answers will be combined with all other participants’ answers, and no identifiable data will be shared with Ipsos’ client.
Are you happy to proceed with the interview? {#Birthday_ins}

Heileo, is mise ..., as (AINM NA HINSTITIÚIDE NÁISIÚNTA), agus táim ag déanamh agallaimh do Ghnóthaí Poiblí Ipsos, ar son cliant dá chuid. Táimid ag lorg daoine in aois 16 bliana nó níos sine atá sásta a gcuid tuairimí a thabhairt ar shaincheisteanna i sochaí an lae inniu. Táimid ag déanamh an tsuirbhé seo fud fad na hEorpa. Níl an suirbhé seo mar chuid d'aon taighde margaíochta, tá suim againn i dtuairimí an phobail a thomhais.
Ba mhór agam dá dtabharfá {#minutes_ins} nóiméad dom chun páirt a ghlacadh sa suirbhé seo. Is de do dheoin féin rannpháirtíocht sa suirbhé agus tig leat d'intinn a athrú am ar bith. Beidh gach freagra faoi rún agus cuirfear isteach le freagraí na rannpháirtithe eile iad. Ciallaíonn sé sin nach mbeidh tú inaitheanta in aon torthaí a fhoilsítear. {#CONSENT_ins}
Más maith leat an Fógra maidir le Cosaint Sonraí a léamh, tá sé ar fáil ag {#intro_link}. Tugtar míniú ann ar an gcuspóir maidir le próiseáil do shonraí pearsanta chomh maith le do chearta um chosaint sonraí.
Le haghaidh dearbhú cáilíochta, d'fhéadfaí an glao seo a mhonatóiriú agus a thaifeadadh.
BREIS EOLAIS MÁ IARRTAR AR AN AGALLÓIR: CONAS A FUAIR TÚ M'UIMHIR: Ghin ríomhaire d'uimhir fóin go randamach, amhail gach uimhir a dhiailímid don taighde seo. Is é ár n-aidhm ná agallamh a chur ar shampla ionadaíoch na tíre seo.
CLIANT? Tá Ipsos ag déanamh an tsuirbhé seo ar son [{#Client}]. Is é cuspóir Suirbhéanna Splancacha Eorabharaiméadair monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar thuairimí an phobail san Aontas Eorpach maidir le réimse leathan saincheisteanna téamacha.
CÉ NA SONRAÍ PEARSANTA A BHAILEOFAR: Úsáidimid d'uimhir fóin le cuireadh a thabhairt duit páirt a ghlacadh san agallamh seo agus le haghaidh rialú cáilíochta amháin. Baileofar inscne agus aois, chomh maith le sonraí pearsanta ó na freagraí ar na ceisteanna san agallamh (amhail stádas pósta). Fanfaidh gach faisnéis a thabharfaidh tú faoi rún, cuirfear do chuid freagraí isteach le freagraí na rannpháirtithe uile eile agus ní chomhroinnfear aon sonraí inaitheanta le cliant Ipsos
An bhfuil tú sásta leanúint leis an agallamh? {#Birthday_ins}
